languages.text: "Госпожа Кибелла, я понимаю, вас взрастил культ смерти, но... Обычные люди скорбят о тех, с кем вместе служили много лет".

traits.locale_text: "Госпожа Кибелла, я понимаю, вас взрастил культ смерти, но... Обычные люди скорбят о тех, с кем вместе служили много лет".

languages.text: "Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Кибелла, я понимаю, вас взрастил культ смерти, но... Обычные люди скорбят о тех, с кем вместе служили много лет".

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."
"Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."
"Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."
"Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."
"Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."
"Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."

languages.text: «Maestra Kibellah, entiendo que se haya criado en un Culto de la Muerte, pero... la gente corriente lamenta la pérdida de aquellos con quienes han servido durante años».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."

languages.text: 「キベラ様、あなた様が死のカルトで育てられたことは理解しておりますが…普通の人々は、長年仕えた相手の死を弔うものなのです」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."

languages.text: “绮贝菈女士，我明白你是在死亡教派中长大成人的，不过……普通人会哀悼那些与他们共同侍奉多年的同伴。”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."

languages.text: "Meisterin Kibellah, ich weiß, Ihr wurdet von einem Todeskult aufgezogen, aber ... gewöhnliche Leute trauern um jene, mit denen sie viele Jahre lang gedient haben."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."

languages.text: « Maîtresse Kibellah, vous avez grandi au sein du culte de la mort, et je le comprends, mais… les gens ordinaires pleurent ceux qui ont été leurs camarades pendant des années. »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."
"Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."

languages.text: "Kibellah Hanım, bir ölüm tarikatı tarafından yetiştirildiğinizi anlıyorum ama... Sıradan insanlar, nice seneler boyunca beraber hizmette bulundukları kişiler için yas tutarlar."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Kibellah, I understand you were raised by a death cult, but... ordinary people mourn those with whom they have served for many years."
